page.title: 03ST.MARY'S PARISH CHURCH.
page.content: The Church is located on the{northern {side of the main A548 Coast Road from {Rhyl to Abergele.}The Church was consecrated in 1873 and stands in 3/4 of an acre of land.The Church is built of{LIMESTONE}with an interior of{ {PORTLAND STONE.}Thwe white stone reredos was painted in 1945 and two painted panels of {ST.DAVID}and{ST. {ASAPH}insered into the recesses each side of the altar.The 50ft{TOWER}and the roof of the Nave were re-tiled in 1985 at a cost of{Â£60,000}.The small West window is in memory of Elsie Carrier. Having been without an incumbent for 18 months,the {REV.HYDE-LINNEKER}of Cerrig y Drudion will become Vicar of Towyn and Rector of St.George in {SEPTEMBER 1985.}
